SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.nimsoft.nimbus
Class NimRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimObjectSender
      com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimRequest

public class NimRequest
extends NimObjectSender

A Request object with PDS content.

Snippet 

 .....
      // Send Request object to the given host / port
      // Do it many times with only a small update in the sent PDS
      NimRequest request = new NimRequest("127.0.0.1",48050,"test_mymethod");
     
      PDS pds = new PDS();
      pds.put("id",84);
      pds.put("text","alfa");
      request.setPds(pds);
      for (int j=0;j<1000;j++) {
          pds.put("id",84+j);
          PDS pdsret = request.send();
      }
      request.close();                  // Optional (only for graceful close of socket)
 
 ....
      // Send one messages to the given named address
      // Put the PDS into the object using the constructor
      PDS pds = new PDS();
      pds.put("id",84);
      pds.put("text","alfa");
      NimRequest request = new NimRequest("myname","test_mymethod",pds);
 
      PDS pdsret = request.send();
 ....
      // Send one messages and wait for an answer (timeout) in up to 10 sec
      PDS pds = new PDS();
      pds.put("id",84);
      pds.put("text","alfa");
      NimRequest request = new NimRequest("myname","test_mymethod",pds);
      request.setTimeout(10*1000);
 
 PDS pdsret = request.send();

Method Detail







setCharset


public void setCharset(String charset)




Set the character set used to encode and decode messages sent 
 using this request. See NimSessionBase.setCharset(String)
 for details about session-specific character sets.





Parameters:
charset - the character set
